name: Odium Unfurling
description:
Your royal rest is disturbed when your oppressed tribe, buried alive with you, begins to rise from the dead to take revenge on you and destroy your tomb. You have no choice but to punish them and send them back to their graves. 

Release of our indie game prototype/ demo "Odium Unfurling" available at this link Worked on it mostly after work and on the weekends, trying to figure out how to work in this team.

This is our first game to release and we still have a lot to learn in the future.

You can reach us on Instagram @streffchristian , @Naidthewarlock or on Twitter @Cationeer.
